name: Ella
description: '''Nor Zila binti Aminuddin''' ([[Jawi script|Jawi]]: '''نور زيلا بنت أمين الدين''' ; IPA: {{IPA|ms|ˈnʊrˈzila ˈbinti ˈaminudɪn}}; born 31 July 1966), known by her stage name '''Ella''', is a Malaysian singer, actress and entrepreneur. She began her career in 1983 at the age of 19 with a local band called Moonracker. She left the band after two years and continued her career by singing at local nightclubs. During that time, a local band called ''The Boys'' approached Ella, and they later became ''Ella & The Boys''.
